name: Continuous Monitoring
description: Degree to which the system is continuously monitored for threats, anomalies, and performance degradation.

values.name: Real-Time Automation
values.description: Real-time monitoring with automated response to detected threats, including dynamic model adaptation and rollback capabilities.

values.name: Comprehensive Monitoring
values.description: Comprehensive monitoring of system inputs, outputs, and internal states, with anomaly detection algorithms and automated alerts for suspicious activity.

values.name: Basic Monitoring
values.description: Basic monitoring in place, but limited analysis and no automated alerts.

values.name: None
values.description: No monitoring for adversarial attacks, anomalies, or performance degradation.
